name: Chrobo, Stuck In a Time Loop
name_original: Chrobo, Stuck In a Time Loop
description:
Control using WASD, double tap A or D to dash.  Be careful of your past, your actions are repeated by your clone!  Defeat all hostile robots in the area to complete the mission

The guy who made this thing in some amount of time under 48 hours:
https://twitter.com/DreadoosaG

The guy who made some nice music for it in under 48 hours:
https://twitter.com/kbjwes77
